remarks: This theorem extends the idea of "at most one" to expressions in two set variables ("at most one pair ` x ` and ` y ` ".  Note: this is not expressed by ` E* x E* y ph ` ). ~ 2eu4 relates this extension to double existential uniqueness, if at least one pair exists.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 26-Oct-2019.)
statement:
2mo2 $p |- ( ( E* x E. y ph /\ E* y E. x ph ) <-> E. z E. w A. x A. y ( ph -> ( x = z /\ y = w ) ) ) $.
$d ph w z $.
$d w x y z $.
